transcript:
this thought, he called Tikhon and began to undress. 
"What devil brought them here?" thought he, while Tikhon was putting the nightshirt over his dried-up old body and gray-haired chest. "I never invited them. They came to dis- turb my life and there is not much of it left." 
"Devil take'em!" he muttered, while his head was still covered by the shirt. 
Tikhon knew his master's habit of some- times thinking aloud, and therefore met with unaltered looks the angrily inquisitive expres- sion of th
